name: Veratex_Blue_Horizon_Bath_Collection
description:
The Veratex Blue Horizon bath collection is a unique and modern
bath ensemble, displays an up to date look with a unique finish.
Items sold separately. This fashion forward set offers multicolored
waves on carefully constructed glass. This unique and elegant
collection has a glass finish, providing easy care. Sold Separately: One (1) lotion dispenser, one (1) soap dish,
  one (1) tissue box cover, one (1) toothbrush holder, one (1)
  tumbler, one (1) waste basketMaterials: GlassLotion dispenser: 2.75 inches long x 2.75 inches wide x 5.375
  inches highSoap dish: 4.25 inches long x 4.25 inches wide x 1 inch
  highTissue box cover: 5.75 inches long x 5.75 inches wide x 5.375
  inches highToothbrush holder: 3.625 inches long x 2 inches wide x 4
  inches highTumbler: 2.75 inches long x 2.75 inches wide x 4 inches
  highWaste basket: 7.875 inches long x 7.875 inches wide x 9.875
  inches highMaterial: GlassStyle: ModernPattern: AbstractFinish: Glass FinishSet Include: Lotion/Soap DispenserColor: BlueStyleModernMaterialGlassFinishGlass FinishPatternAbstractSet IncludeLotion/Soap DispenserColorBlue
